content: the right side top needle knit across all stitches sole needle k2tog knit across all stitches you now have _____ b stitches on each needle and are ready to do your leg revisiting widdershin heel by karen k2karen s basic sock chart numbers for the widdershin-style heel c b d e f gusset increase to stitches gusset marker heel marker heel turn markers 15 27 8 11 4 16 28 8 12 4 17 31 9 13 4 18 30 9 12 6 19 33 10 13 6 20 34 10 14 6 21 37 11 15 6 22 38 11 16 6 23 41 12 17 6 24 42 12 18 6 25 45 13 19 6 26 46 13 20 6 27 47 14 19 8 28 48 14 20 8 29 51 15 21 8 30 52 15 22 8 31 55 16 23 8 32 56 16 24 8 33 59 17 25 8 34 60 17 26 8 35 63 18 27 8 36 62 18 26 10 37 65 19 27 10 38 66 19 28 10 39 69 20 29 10 by by k2karen - http //k2knits blogspot com/2007/03/revisiting-widdershin-heel html
